channel.title: [pi/dspk] cant use object when right next to it?
channel.description: If i click an object when im atleast one tile away from it, i will run to it and then use it. However, if im right next to it and click it, nothing happens.

@thock321 wrote:

If i click an object when im atleast one tile away from it, i will run to it and then use it. However, if im right next to it and click it, nothing happens.
